item.title: Stock Futures Edge Higher as Chip Stocks Lead Gains
item.description: U.S. stock futures climbed as global chip stocks rallied on the back of strong earnings from a key assembler of Nvidia and Apple products.

item.title: Canadian Dollar Rises After Reports PM Trudeau Could Resign
item.description: The Canadian dollar rose following media reports that Prime Minister Justin Trudeau could announce that he will resign, potentially as early as Monday...

item.title: Trump’s tariff policy claims its first victim with Trudeau reportedly to resign
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump’s tariff policy has claimed its first victim before the president even returned to office.

item.title: Bank alleges Bill Cosby ‘failed to repay’ loans; he could face foreclosure on two NYC homes
item.description: Cosby and his wife are reportedly facing foreclosure on two townhouses, after allegedly failing to keep up with repayments on multimillion-dollar loan...

item.title: ‘I’m rich beyond my wildest dreams’: I’m 66 and inherited $500,000. How do I make sure this money lasts?
item.description: “Should I buy an investment property? stocks? CDs?”
